page.title: 03WOMAN 5O+ LIVING ALONE (2)
page.content: Main local threat is the threat of Portsmouth Dockyard being closed. Portsmouth is the home of the Royal Navy and is the main employment in the area and if closed, unemployment would rise dramatically and Portsmouth would become derelict. In the future she would like to see more social life up on the hill because at the moment it is all in the centre of the village. Today doctors and shop assistants look at their work as just a job where in the past doctors and shop asssistants got to know their patients/customers and today this has been lost.
